2078480.name: Anomalia
2078480.description:
Disclaimer: Purchase of this base game includes the first chapter. Other chapters are DLC.
You must survive this horror and puzzle game, Robots were created to aid in technological advances, but here they are getting more and more terrible, explore the place and delve deeper into the terror.
This company created a factory of Machines of all kinds, in 2010, the creation of Adam the first artificial intelligence was celebrated, everything was going well until an incident happened, the factory was marked as inactive, the victims were never found, all that was left it was an empty place full of machines.
2078480.supported_languages:
葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
